modules.description: Provides pretty-printers for error and write error types, and implements reading from and writing to a network flow. It handles buffer transfers, supports writing multiple buffers at once, and manages connection closure with proper synchronization. Works with flow objects, buffers represented as Cstruct.t, and custom error types for reporting issues during I/O operations.

Provides functions to wrap a MirageOS flow into a network interface, including initialization, data transmission, and state management. Operates on flow objects and network packets represented as byte sequences. Enables integration of custom network protocols within a MirageOS environment.

transforms network flows into usable network interfaces by handling data transfer, error reporting, and connection management. it operates on flow objects and Cstruct.t buffers, supporting multi-buffer writes and synchronized closure. it includes custom error types for detailed I/O feedback and pretty-printers for debugging. examples include reading packets from a flow, writing multiple buffers in a single operation, and handling connection termination gracefully.
